name: Archibald's Adventures
summary:
一款非常好玩的单机闯关游戏，IPHONE上有这款游戏，官网还发布了WINDOWS版本的。游戏有3种模式，异常的耐玩。游戏刚开始很简单，到后面就非常的难了，非常考验大脑和操控能力，故事模式有114关，困难模式有49关，开心模式有28关，推荐大家先玩故事模式再玩其他两个模式。

In Archibalds Adventures you have to play a role of Archibald who is stuck in the hazard filled mansion of a crazy Professor Klumpfus. This goofy Professor was performing his latest experiment but failed and due to this failure some strange lifeforms have escaped from their control. Also the central control computer has locked up the residence leaving no hope for Archie or the Professor to exit. Spend your time to get yourself out in its challenging 114 levels. Play this funny action puzzle game and help Archibald to overcome from the trouble.
